description: Some of the world’s oldest churches and mosques have been completely destroyed in the conflict.
maintext: One image seen on X, formerly known as Twitter, shows an Israeli soldier posing in front of a fallen minaret which has been graffitied in Hebrew with the words "the temple will be rebuilt" - a reference to a belief that a third Jewish temple will be built on the contested holy site in Jerusalem known to Jews as the Temple Mount and to Muslims as Haram al-Sharif or the al-Aqsa Mosque compound.
title: Israel-Gaza war: Counting the destruction of religious sites
